sentences.cn: 感染的伤口看起来发炎了.

sentences.en: Clean the wound so it doesn’t get infected.
Dig out and burn infected canes.
sentences.cn: 把受感染的甘蔗挖出来烧掉。
尘土会使敞露的伤口受到感染.

sentences.en: He had become infected with Aids from an improperly sterilised needle.
sentences.cn: 他因使用消毒不当的注射针头而感染了艾滋病。

sentences.en: In heavily infected areas, half the population become blind.
sentences.cn: 在受污染严重的地区，有一半人口失明。

sentences.en: It infected them with some of the magic of a lost age.
sentences.cn: 逝去的岁月让他们平添了几分魅力。

sentences.en: Mary's high spirits infected all the girls in the class.
sentences.cn: 玛丽的兴致感染了全班的女孩.

sentences.en: Political life has been infected by growing nationalist sentiment.
sentences.cn: 政治生活已受到了不断高涨的民族主义情绪的影响。

sentences.en: She infected the whole class with her enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 她的热情感染了整个班级.

sentences.en: The monkeys had been immunized with a vaccine made from infected cells.
sentences.cn: 这些猴子已经注射了由受感染的细胞培养而成的疫苗。

sentences.en: The wound from the dog bite had become infected.
They are all infected with his high spirits.
sentences.cn: 他们都被他的高昂的情绪所鼓舞.

sentences.en: This virus infected thousands of computers within days.
sentences.cn: 这种病毒在短短几天内感染了数千台计算机。

words.tran_cn: 传染的；传染性的；易传染的
有传染性的，感染别人的

trans.tran_en: a part of your body or a wound that is infected has harmful bacteria in it which prevent it from healing

trans.tran_cn: （受）传染( infect的过去式和过去分词 )，污染，影响
